- `disk` (DiskConfig) - Disk

- `name` (string) - if name is set export this data volume as an artifact and don't delete it

- `preallocation` (bool) - Whether this data volume should be preallocated.

- `source_type` (string) - data volume source

- `source_url` (string) - Source URL

- `volume_mode` (string) - persistent volume claim

- `storage_class_name` (string) - Storage Class Name

- `size` (string) - Size
